title: LISTING_EVENTS_DAILY: new columns in output | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2024_07 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.

When this behavior change bundle is enabled, two new columns appear in
LISTING_EVENTS_DAILY view in the
Data Sharing Usage schema.
The access type of the listing. The access type is also called the monetization type.
The date and time that a listing-related event occurred.
